articles.title: Pig heart transplanted into dying man in breakthrough operation was infected with virus, report says - Independent.ie
articles.description: An American man who died two months after receiving the first-ever human heart transplant from a pig may have been the victim of a pig virus infection, a new report said.
articles.content:
An American man who died two months after receiving the first-ever human heart transplant from a pig may have been the victim of a pig virus infection, a new report said.

articles.title: Here are key moments from Amber Heard's testimony - Good Morning America
articles.description: Heard said Johnny Depp hit her on numerous occasions, including once after doing the drug known as ecstasy with a flight attendant on a flight to Russia.
